definition: silk/thread/trace/(cuisine) shreds or julienne strips/CL:條|条[tiao2]/classifier: a thread (of cloud, smoke etc), a bit, an iota, a hint (of sth) etc

sentences.english: Treatment with extra high temperature steam is beneficial to the elasticity and loftiness of floss silk.
sentences.chinese: 超高溫蒸汽處理有利於增加絲綿的彈性和蓬鬆性。
